frameDefinitions: An Agent is described as pursuing an Activity, expending some effort.
This frame contains  words for Individuals as viewed in terms of their vocation.
An Earner receives Earnings by providing Goods to a Buyer; providing the Goods also generally entails a cost, which may or may not be included in the consideration.

A Researcher (an individual a group or institution) attempts to answer a Question by means of consulting literature,  observation, or conducting experiments in a particular Field pertinent to the Question.
This frame contains words referring to teaching and the participants in teaching.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
frameExamples: Sky, a Korean War veteran, was <t>active</t> in his opposition to Vietnam and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.
This reflects the 15 % jump in <t><fex name='Earnings'>earnings</fex></t> over 1994 .
Simmons and Nadel did <t>research</t> pertaining to Ardea purpurea and Egretta garzetta in 1998
Dad <t>taught</t> me that if you work hard, you will be OK - no matter what happens.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
This role identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the  <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
The <fen>Person</fen> is the human being.
The <fen>Earner</fen> is involved in a transaction or set of transactions as the party that receives payment.
<fen>Earnings</fen> are the money given to the <fen>Earner</fen> in a transaction, generally in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The people engaged in a research endeavor.
An area of inquiry.
A significant unanswered open proposition which the <fen>Researcher</fen> is attempting to resolve.
A phenomenon or idea involved in a <fen>Question</fen>.
The time when  the research is carried out.
The physical place where the research is carried out.
One who instructs a <fen>Student</fen> in some area of knowledge or skill.
One who is instructed by a <fen>Teacher</fen> in skills or knowledge.
An educational establishment, such as a school or college.
The area of knowledge or skill which is taught by a <fen>Teacher</fen> or to a <fen>Student</fen>.
A formal Qualification such as an academic degree or a certificate for which a student is aiming.
An action which the <fen>Student</fen> is able to perform as a result of instruction.
A guideline for correct behavior. In most cases, this concerns morally or socially desirable actions.
A piece of information that the <fen>Student</fen> is informed of by the <fen>Teacher</fen>.
Educational <fen>Material</fen>, such as books, tapes, or videos, used by a <fen>Teacher</fen> or a <fen>Student</fen> to acquire skills or knowledge.
A role, typically professional or vocational,  that the <fen>Student</fen> is meant to be able to fill as a result of their training.
FN: a program of lectures or other matter dealing with a subject
The time when the teaching occurs.

The <fen>Place</fen> is the location within which the teaching takes place.

Consider whether a possible <fen>Place</fen> phrase is really where the training took place or is rather part of a description of the <fen>Institution</fen>.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
listRoleExamples: He is always active <fex>demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.
<fex>He</fex> was active for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.
<fex>As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were active across the board.
Jacques Fuller has been active <fex>as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.
Commercial selling was active <fex>yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.
He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is active <fex>at the YMCA</fex>.
Pfizer made billions <fex>in the 1990s</fex> .
She made a lot of money <fex>in Africa</fex> .
Before he became an astronaut, <fex>Grunsfeld</fex> did research in physics.
When we have researched <fex>why Brazilian mothers have stopped breastfeeding</fex>, principal reasons given are 'poor milk' and 'insufficient milk' .
Would you take part in research <fex>on the best place to have a baby</fex>?

<fex>During summer of 1999</fex>, I did research using a technique called 'Path Integral Monte
Carlo', to simulate quantum particles.
Johnson and Randall's research <fex>in Africa</fex> has proven extremely valuable.
She's a <fex>French</fex> Teacher
She's Studying <fex>for a Master's degree</fex>
Taut with worry, Dad taught us <fex>how to drive</fex>.
My brother taught me <fex>not to be mean to guys when I'm not interested in them</fex>.
When I was two she taught me <fex>that a quarter was 25 cents and a dime was 10 cents</fex>.
All employees have received <fex>a booklet</fex> INSTRUCTING them on how to report ` anything from unwanted touching and uncalled-for blue jokes to overt demands for sexual favours . '
When his father died he went to live with an uncle in Ka'u who trained him <fex>as a warrior</fex> during his teenage years
They were generating <fex>grenades</fex> for export.
